TelemetryDefinitionVersion.name: TelemetryDefinitionVersion
TelemetryDefinitionVersion.description: Represents a version of the structure of a telemetry signal sent from a connected asset or vehicle.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry definition version.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the telemetry definition version is active (true) or not (false).

TelemetryComponentStructure.description: The structure of the components in the telemetry definition that send signals, represented in a JSON format.

TelemetryDefinitionId.description: The telemetry definition that's associated with the telemetry definition version.

VersionNumber.description: The version number of the telemetry definition version.
